scripts.example:basic: cd examples/basic && pnpm i && pnpm dev
scripts.example:redux-toolkit: cd examples/redux-toolkit && pnpm i && pnpm dev
scripts.build-example:basic: cd examples/basic && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.build-example:redux-toolkit: cd examples/redux-toolkit && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.build-example:tsup: cd examples/tsup && pnpm i && pnpm build
scripts.test-example:jest-preset: cd examples/jest-preset && pnpm i && pnpm test
